metadata.Title: CVE-2022-37032 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds read in the BGP daemon of FRRouting FRR before 8.4 may lead to a segmentation fault and denial of service. This occurs in bgp_capability_msg_parse in bgpd/bgp_packet.c.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> code is similar in quagga, probably vulnerable the frr patch for this issue is incompatible with quagga, as is requires the size of the struct to be changed: https://github.com/FRRouting/frr/commit/a46a2e9b4e8de782ac07e01429a80ed7ec167dcb changing the size of that struct causes s390x to fail tests.

criterions.comment: quagga: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
